data.text: Yuba mɔn yi a fala, a naxa,
a luxi nɛn
N ma Ala,
Nde nɔɛ se sariɲanxin bɛ se haramuxini?
I bata muxuna siimayaan danna ragidi,
Nanara, i yɛɛn ba muxun na,
“Yigin wudin tan ma,
hali a salenna fori bɔxɔni,
igen nɛɛn fa sa a ma tun,
Koni, xa muxun faxa,
Igen ɲanma nɛn baani,
Muxun na faxa,
“Xa i yi tinɲɛ n luxunɲɛ laxira yi nun,
Koni muxun naxan bata faxa,
Nayi, n ni i yabɛ, i na n xili,
Anu iki, i n sigati kiin birin yatɛxi.
i n ma murutɛ feene luxunma nɛn bɛnbɛnla kui,
“Koni, hali geyane,
igen luma nde bɛ gɛmɛne ra,
I muxune yɛngɛma habadan,
Xa binyena e diine ma,
A tan nan tun a tɔrɔn kolon,
